attributes.action: Justice on animal cruelty and neglect. Harsher punishment should be carried out.
attributes.additional_details: If the link hasn't been taken off fb the video should still be available.
attributes.background: Recently I watched a video a vicious attack on a cat by two dogs in small heath. ripping her apart. some guy stopped his car not to help the cat but to record a video so he can add it on social media sites.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think these petitions are similar to yours:  

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/104779
or
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/105764

You might like to sign one of these petitions instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
